sentence: “Fourteen months of chaos and we’re doing a bill on hair,” said Rep. Jim Jordan, Ohio Republican.
author: Mica Soellner
title: House passes bill aimed to ban race-based hair discrimination

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) carped that the House should instead focus on inflation or gas prices.
author: Sebastian Murdock
title: House Passes CROWN Act, Banning Discrimination Against Black Hairstyles

sentence: It’s wrong if it happens,” said Rep. Jim Jordan (Ohio), the top Republican on the House Judiciary Committee.
author: Cristina Marcos
title: House passes CROWN Act, banning race-based hair discrimination
